title: Shadow of the Blood Moon
description: Genevieve Labreck is back with a score to settle. Her mom has been kidnapped by Zane, hybrid and all-around monster. Rumors fly that Gen’s mom is holed away in Prague, a city recognized by humans for its serene beauty and intense culture, but Gen and Will know something humans don’t. Prague is haunted by dark, evil forces.Can Gen and Will save her mom, or will they be too late?Some will live, others will fall. At what price do you walk away from those you love?
author: Robin P. Waldrop
